snippet: Eric Grossman, who joined Morgan Stanley in 2006,  become the firm's top legal eagle, taking over from Frank Barron.  Mr. Grossman who has also been asked to join the firm's operating committee.
abstract: Eric Grossman, who joined Morgan Stanley in 2006,  become the firm's top legal eagle, taking over from Frank Barron.  Mr. Grossman who has also been asked to join the firm's operating committee.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Names Chief Legal Officer
